name: Dr. Sarah Rahman
bio: Dr. Sarah has over 10 years of experience in cardiology and has treated thousands of patients with heart-related issues.

name: Dr. Ahmed Khan
bio: Dr. Ahmed is committed to providing top-notch primary healthcare to underprivileged communities.

name: Ayesha Rahim
bio: Ayesha has been working tirelessly in organizing medical camps and reaching out to communities in need.

name: Hassan Al Mamun
bio: Hassan is passionate about assisting doctors and ensuring the best medical care for all.

name: Farzana Alam
bio: Farzana has been leading medical teams in emergency care, ensuring quick and efficient treatment for patients in need.

name: Rakib Hossain
bio: Rakib ensures that all medical camps have the necessary equipment, medicine, and supplies for smooth operations.
